articles.content: A UPS strike by 185,000 workers 25 years ago brought the logistics giants operations to a standstill. The 15-day strike slashed package deliveries, overwhelmed the US Postal Service and FedEx, and hu… [+5119 chars]

articles.title: What Is the Best CD Term Right Now? - Investopedia
articles.description: The best CD term right now might be the one with the highest rate of 5.65%, but if you really want to maximize returns, a slightly lower rate on a longer term will be better.
articles.content: If youre looking to maximize your savings and lock in a high interest rate in a certificate of deposit (CD), youre likely shopping around for the best CD term to buy right now. The answer might be th… [+4444 chars]
